create(StudentCreateDTO) - Method in class nuricanozturk.dev.management.student.controller.StudentManagementController
Create a student with the given dto class Check is the student already exists then Calculate the average of the grades and save the student entity to the database if user exists return a response message with a bad request status and message "Student already exists".
